storyInfo: Innkeeper Zheng preemptively intercepts the thief known as Blacknight, only to be accosted by the pole-carrier Shang Zhong, who snatches the goblet. Kroos's party finds the boatman, and looks to link up with Lee.

attributes.content: The breeze in the mountains is ever crisp and cool.
And mornings as refreshing as these are always fine for settling muddy, murky matters.
In a mountain-sat village, when kitchen's smoke has just sprung up, the snow still unreceded in spring, one old and one young stand off against each other.
The only sound, the single strike of a faraway gong.
You've kept me waiting.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Tch. Bloody lout... Light, stay cool for the moment.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I've seen you before. Hmm. So it was you.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Unexpected, for sure. A Rim Billitonian, silently lurking in Shangshu since the very beginning.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I can't understand you, sorry.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Light!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: What—?!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: A snare?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You train these slumberfoots well. An ordinary woman would be headfirst in the ground by now.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: (He didn't just notice the snare behind him, he stepped on the rope without hesitation... Bastard...)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Don't worry, I won't make this hard for you, girl.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Do you know what that goblet you're holding is?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It's not my concern, or my interest. It's newbie bounty hunters that ask too many questions.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Then you have only yourself to blame.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Don't get so full of yourself! Helmet! Drill!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: If you don't know what it is, then be wise and hand it over. Don't be used for nothing.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: H-How dare you do that to Helmet—! You asked for it!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: ...A headless bolt.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: (H-He caught it barehanded? At this distance?! And I *just* changed the string on my crossbow—!)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Seeing how you're unwilling to take my life, I'll give you one chance.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Hand over the goblet to me, and then tell the one instructing you: Tread carefully. Don't be selfish.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Hmph. You know who hired me?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Whether I know or not doesn't matter. What matters is I can stop you, right here.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Why should I listen to you?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: You have no choice.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Maybe you can run, but you could never bear to see these beasts of yours meet a sorry fate.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You're threatening me?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: You have skill. But aside from your crossbow, you've got nothing in a fight.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You can pull out before you're in too deep. You need a good eye and the right people, if you want to survive here.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: True. They never told me someone as capable as you would get in the way.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: If I had someone do something dangerous for me, I wouldn't give them the whole picture either.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It's just a job to you, stranger. Why stake your life on it?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Give the cup to me, and I vow on the Escorts' name that whatever they're paying you, we'll double it.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Hah, I was taking a loss anyway with all my volunteer work.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Call this a favor for a friend.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: A friend.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: So even you bandits of the wild don't mind a sacrifice for a friend.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Sounds like you've got something against us.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: No... not at all.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: The longer you do business, the more fine people you meet, the less friends you end up with.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Then be smart, and go back to your business.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Yes, business is always easiest done in the mountains.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Three Mounts, Seventeen Peaks, hundreds of passes. Is there any road without a teahouse and station for travelers to rest their feet? Is there any road... without our people?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I hope you see clear now, girl.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You really don't think anything of me.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: A direct confrontation might not be my style, but you've pissed me off just far enough... isn't that right, my darlings?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) The old todger wants to have a go, let's give 'im a go! We've been around the paddock a few times, we're no strangers!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Some just refuse to learn.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If that's your answer, then you'll pay the—
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Even if a third party was stood there watching, they wouldn't have a clue just how the coming step came to land.
Simply put, the man is adept in walking passes, in climbing mountains. The steps he lifts and places, day after day after day, are truly too many to count.
In one clean noise, clay bricks shatter in the ground. Before him, dust drifts down. By his gaze is a simple, common bamboo-wood carrying pole. His gaze itself, faint rage.
Far away, the gong strikes again.
—H-How... Where did he come from... Wait, Light, calm down! And Drill! Back to me...!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: ...It's you.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You finally came to the mountains.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: So I came to find you.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: What comes will come. Nothing's avoidable forever. Is there a need to be so hasty?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Hey. Miss.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: ...Are you talking to me?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (His movement—is that wooden stick one of their carrying poles? What did he do just now... to shatter bricks made of stone?)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Do you know him?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Then there's some problem between you.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I only see you between us.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You're right. I'm your problem, then.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: When I'm done here, I'll come see you. But not now.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Miss. Does this relate to the item in your hands?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Uh... it does...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: This is personal business. And major at that. Stay out of it.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: How major?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: The safety of the nation is at stake! Life and death!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Since that rainy night those years ago, I've rarely heard you use such a tone.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I see. How could you be the villain here? What a chivalrous swordsman. What a dutiful innkeeper.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Then get out of the way—
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: —But I know just who you are, and that's why you'll never see me.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: And if you won't, then it changes nothing if I find you. That's why I never came down from the mountains.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: So. If...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Hey! You—!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Give that back!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: It was ten years.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Ten years ago, you watched as my son died... so you could protect this goblet.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Shang Zhong!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Miss. This is nothing to do with you now.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You steal my things while I'm not looking, and then tell me it's not my business?!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: This was never yours.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Shang Zhong, have you lost it?!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You're free to go now.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Shang Zhong!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Leave!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Grr...!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Mark my words, you two... I'll be back for it!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Zheng Qingyue... Where's your blade?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: At home.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I see. At home.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: That rainy night, in the escort, over a dozen lost their lives. There was a boy among them, and a father.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: The boy was a Shang. My boy. The father was a Du. Du Yaoye's father.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: That's why you don't carry your blade.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: What a tremendous joke.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You still hate me to this day.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I don't hate you. I know you didn't mean to. The blame lies with you, but no fault.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: 'Save the goods, then the men,' hm?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Yet the goods are gone now, and so are the men. Am I still not allowed to condemn you?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I must ask you give justification, or else I cannot live on.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I will. Give me the goblet. Do you know what it entails—
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: No. He died for this cup then. I'll bury it beside him today.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I'll be waiting atop the mountain, for you to fetch your blade.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Master Shen!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Mm? What brought you over here? I was about to look for you at Liang's.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Where's young Lee?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The goblet got stolen. Mr. Lee sent us to fetch you.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Did he tell you anything about this?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: He asked you to come get me, but not to first find Mr. Liang?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: To be clear, you came from the Liang residence?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Er... yeah.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*. The fact he didn't send you to find Liang Xun means deep down, he already knows...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Gifted, how gifted. How truly gifted.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: You're back, Uncle?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How were things?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In regards to her, thoughtful of etiquette, true as can be.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: If she was so ready to display etiquette, that shows there's still room for mediation.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: This is regardless of how she acts, or what intentions she harbors. Master Tai's instructions lie here, and they can't be false.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: She's clever.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Since I visited in an official's capacity, she should have realized to some extent.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Both sides are now strained to breaking point. We stand on a hair trigger.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: We can only resolve this incident before we draw even more dispute.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: If we really do want everyone to trust that our methods can forever rid Yan of the sword hanging over her head, then we naturally must obey those magic words—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: —Frank and forthright.
attributes.name: Zuo Le
